summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3687 , for the improvement of East Pine Street (north side) from Broadway to Boylston Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45453 , and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
